alert.note: Alert for Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 3:06AM EDT until March 25 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Murray County in northwestern Georgia... Eastern Whitfield County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 345 AM EDT. * At 306 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Varnell, or 7 miles east of Ringgold, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dalton, Chatsworth, Varnell, Eton, Cohutta, Crandall, Sumac, Ramhurst, Gregory, Tennga, Beaverdale, Dawnville, Cisco, Fort Mountain State Park and North Georgia Speedway. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
